meanings.sent1: The zebrine curtains in the room added a wild touch to the decor.
meanings.sent2: The zebrine stripes on the shirt made it stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The zebrine pattern on the socks made them look like tiny zebras running around.
meanings.sent4: Her zebrine scarf wrapped around her neck like a protective shield.
meanings.sent5: The zebrine design on the car hood was eye-catching and unique.

meanings.sent1: The zebrine habitat at the zoo was carefully designed to mimic the natural environment of zebras.
meanings.sent2: The zebrine behavior of the animal showed similarities to those of zebras in the wild.
meanings.sent3: The zebrine stripes on the walls of the zebra exhibit made the visitors feel like they were in the savanna.
meanings.sent4: Her zebrine-themed party decorations transported everyone to the world of zebras.
meanings.sent5: The zebrine colors used in the zebra conservation campaign caught the attention of many supporters.

meanings.definition: Marked with stripes like a zebra.
meanings.sent1: The zebrine pattern on the rug gave the room a bold and striking look.
meanings.sent2: The zebrine markings on the butterfly's wings were mesmerizing to watch.
meanings.sent3: The zebrine stripes on the road sign made it easy to spot from a distance.
meanings.sent4: Her zebrine umbrella stood out in the sea of plain black ones.
meanings.sent5: The zebrine fur of the stuffed toy zebra felt soft and comforting to touch.
